about_the_game:
"Debt's Descent: The Haunting at the Abandoned Hospital" offers players a truly immersive experience with multiple endings, ensuring that every choice they make carries weight and consequences. Your ultimate fate hinges on your decisions, your wit, and your ability to navigate the treacherous halls of the haunted hospital.

Survival Ending: To achieve this ending, players must make strategic choices that prioritize survival:

Explore Thoroughly: Players must carefully investigate the hospital's eerie surroundings, examining every nook and cranny for clues and tools that can aid in their escape. These might include keys, documents, or objects that can help unlock doors or reveal the hospital's dark secrets.

Solve Puzzles: Throughout the game, players will encounter challenging puzzles that require intelligence and cunning to solve. These puzzles may hold the key to unlocking critical areas or discovering important information about the hospital's history and the vengeful spirits that haunt it.

Avoid Confrontation: When encountering the tormented spirits, players must choose their actions wisely. Interacting with the spirits can have dire consequences, and sometimes it's better to evade them or find alternative ways to progress without angering the apparitions.

Escape Plan: Players must devise a clever escape plan that takes into account the layout of the hospital, the locations of threats, and the tools they've collected. This plan will be instrumental in reaching the exit and ensuring survival.

The beauty of "Debt's Descent: The Haunting at the Abandoned Hospital" lies in its dynamic storytelling, where every choice influences the outcome. Will you emerge from this ordeal with your life intact and your debts settled, or will you succumb to the horrors lurking in the shadows? The choice is yours, and only your decisions will determine your fate in this spine-chilling horror game.

name: Scape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 8500+ Series)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Escape insurmountable debt in a haunted asylum. Solve puzzles, confront vengeful spirits, and survive the chilling unknown. Can you make it out?
